alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Bradford, southern Baker, Union, east central Columbia and south central Charlton Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Olustee to Lulu. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Butler, Raiford, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Palestine Community, Lulu, Olustee, Sanderson, Providence and Ellerbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union
